020
021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.platform.Identifiable;
023
024/**
025 * An ItemProvider represents a provider used to give the Locale stack, and provide various item stack
026 * comparisons. This could be used for something such as ItemsAdder, etc.
027 *
028 * @param <T> The implementation-specific type of this item stack.
029 * @author creatorfromhell
030 * @since 0.2.0.0
031 */
032public interface ItemProvider<T> extends Identifiable {
033
034  /**
035   * Checks if the given serialized item stack applies to the specified item.
036   *
037   * @param serialized The serialized item stack to check against the item.
038   * @param item The item to check against.
039   * @return True if the serialized item stack applies to the item, false otherwise.
040   */
041  boolean appliesTo(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> serialized, final T item);
042
043  /**
044   * Checks if the provided item stack is similar to the original item stack.
045   *
046   * @param original The original item stack to compare against.
047   * @param compare The item stack to compare.
048   * @return True if the two item stacks are similar, otherwise false.
049   */
050  boolean similar(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original, final T compare);
051
052  /**
053   * Returns true if the provided item is similar to this. An item is similar if the basic
054   * information is the same, except for the amount. What this includes: - material - display -
055   * modelData - flags - lore - attributes - enchantments
056   * What this does not include: - Item Data/components.
057   *
058   * @param compare The stack to compare.
059   *
060   * @return True if the two are similar, otherwise false.
061   * @since 0.2.0.0
062   * @author creatorfromhell
063   */
064  default boolean similar(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original, final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> compare) {
065
066    return original.itemProvider().equalsIgnoreCase(compare.itemProvider())
067           && original.providerItemID().equalsIgnoreCase(compare.providerItemID());
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Checks if the components of two items are equal.
072   *
073   * @param original The original item to compare.
074   * @param compare The item to compare against the original.
075   * @return true if the components of the two items are equal, otherwise false.
076   */
077  default boolean componentsEqual(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original, final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> compare) {
078
079    //We don't need to check this since the item providers are direct copies.
080    return true;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Checks if the components of two items are equal.
085   *
086   * @param original The original item to compare.
087   * @param compare The item to compare against the original.
088   * @return true if the components of the two items are equal, otherwise false.
089   */
090  default boolean componentsEqual(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original, final T compare) {
091
092    //We don't need to check this since the item providers are direct copies.
093    return true;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Checks if the components of two items are equal.
098   *
099   * @param original The original item to compare.
100   * @param compare The item to compare against the original.
101   * @return true if the components of the two items are equal, otherwise false.
102   */
103  default boolean componentsEqual(final T original, final T compare) {
104
105    //We don't need to check this since the item providers are direct copies.
106    return true;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Creates a copy of the original item stack with a specified amount.
111   *
112   * @param original The original item stack to copy.
113   * @param amount The amount for the new item stack.
114   * @return A new item stack with the specified amount.
115   */
116  T locale(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original, final int amount);
117
118  /**
119   * @return An instance of the implementation's locale version of AbstractItemStack.
120   * @since 0.2.0.0
121   * @author creatorfromhell
122   */
123  default T locale(final AbstractItemStack<? extends T> original) {
124
125    return locale(original, 1);
126  }
127}
